commit.message:
loop-iv.c (simple_rhs_p): Allow more kinds of expressions.

	* loop-iv.c (simple_rhs_p): Allow more kinds of expressions.

From-SVN: r145355

files.patch:
@@ -23,6 +23,8 @@

 	Generate the comparison by using simplify_gen_relational.
 
+	* loop-iv.c (simple_rhs_p): Allow more kinds of expressions.
